claim: Overall, 109 RCTs were included in the analysis (Fig. 1).
title: Fig. 1.
caption: Flowchart of included randomized controlled trials (last search date July 20, 2022)

claim: There were nine RCTs that had at least one outcome with a change in the number of participants with outcome events or the number of participants analyzed, which yielded a minor change in the estimate of the effect (Fig. 2) [20–37].
title: Fig. 2.
caption: Discrepancy in effect estimates between preprint and subsequent journal article of COVID-19 RCTs. RCT, randomized controlled trial; n, number of participants with outcome events; N, number of participants analyzed; CI, confidence interval; D28, day 28; article, peer-reviewed journal; WHO-CPS, World Health Organization Clinical Progression Score
